website_summaries.verdict: An affordable choice with 4 figures that are great for collecting and play for youngsters who can't get enough Peppa Pig.
pros: The adorable pig family that kids love: Peppa, George, Mummy, and Daddy
Versatile – characters fit Peppa Pig playsets including houses and vehicles
cons: The paint has been known to chip and fade

customer_reviews.title: Arrived fast.
customer_reviews.text: Great toys perfect for my cake,,, just what i need it and great quality :) highly recomended..
customer_reviews.author: lovemykids

customer_reviews.title: Toddler is happy
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my daughter, got them when she was 3 and she just turned 4 she still loves them. She has been playing with them for little bit now. They are well made and durable. She loves playing with them, she likes smaller toys which these are. Not too small, but small enough for little hands. For the price, not too bad. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jaylinn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little toys!!!
customer_reviews.text: These arrived a couple of days early and my daughter absolutely loves them!! They are the perfect size for her little two year old hands but no worry of choking hazard. She knows all their names and does role play with them. I am very happy with this product and plan to buy more, starting with the castle!
customer_reviews.author: Suzi

customer_reviews.text: my daughter likes the peppa pig, and was tremendously excited when she saw them, although I give her 3 stars because they come with black spots that she wanted to return, but when my daughter opened it, she completely broke the package and did not want to. me to return them
customer_reviews.author: Nelly L

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old loves them
customer_reviews.text: I put these in Easter eggs for my 2 year old Peppa pig lover. She was most excited that they were all wearing crowns. They are very cute, good quality, figures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love Peppa
customer_reviews.text: Peppa and her family look so fine in their royal crowns. My little 4 year old loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Pigs
customer_reviews.text: Got for my granddaughter last year for Christmas. Was worth the money. Would recommend to a Freind.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of pigs!
customer_reviews.text: Cute little set of pigs! Nice quality and they can sit or stand, as their little legs move.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old niece who is obsessed with Peppa Pig. Great quality and not cheap looking. Just like the pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Taryn Weingardt

customer_reviews.title: More Peppa!
customer_reviews.text: My kids are obsessed with all things Peppa. This added nicely to their collection.
customer_reviews.author: MWLTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Peppa is the one
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves Peppa Pig and she loved these. Got her the castle to go along with the little figures.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: If your toddler is obsessed with peppa pig- this is fantastic for the price. Perfect size and keeps them busy for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Happy 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: Christmas purchase for a 4 year old who is head over heels for Peppa. She adored them. She received the castle and carriage as well.
customer_reviews.author: ADS

customer_reviews.title: Daughter Approved lol
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved them for her peppa princess carriage. She was extremely delighted to see her peppa toys, thanks❤ ps. Peppa princess carriage purchased separately.
customer_reviews.author: Magical Beauty

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: My little one loved these. I'm impressed with the construction and strudyness of the figurines. Love that their arms and legs move so they sit :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute Toys
customer_reviews.text: Cute toys for a cheap price. Def recommend to other parents.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Alternative
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted the Peppa Pig family set, but the original version of them were sold out. I saw that prime had the "Royal" version and I purchased it, obviously. She absolutely loved this ! Great for kids who are into pretend play. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Peppa pig family
customer_reviews.text: This house full of children loves everything peppa pig great product
customer_reviews.author: Wendy B

customer_reviews.title: These are super cute. I used them as my cake topper ...
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute. I used them as my cake topper for one of my customers who love peppa pig
customer_reviews.author: Karen J

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great price for these figurines, fast shipping and price was right. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Latingirl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were the great quality you would expect to see and my daughter loved the crowns!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittania

customer_reviews.title: Peppa pig's family low prices great quality
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, low price great quality merchandise. My granddaughter will love the Peppa pig set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute little Peppa Family toys
customer_reviews.text: I used these as cake toppers for my kiddos bday party. What you see is what you get!
customer_reviews.author: OG Lisa O

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Very cute my son love peppa pig cartoon and he love these little guys
customer_reviews.author: Kym

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Cute birthday gift for 3 yr old girl. She liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Marly

customer_reviews.title: My daughter moved her toys!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the toys. Originally bought for her cake. A bit expensive but definitely worth it after seeing her face of excitement!
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: A hit with granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old granddaughter loved the set! She began playing with them immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: The Peppa Pig Royals
customer_reviews.text: My great grand daughter needed these for the Castle I ordered and the Coach. She really enjoys this line of toys and has most of them
customer_reviews.author: Aida

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: These little Peppa Pig figurines where perfect to decorate my daughters birthday cake! Now she enjoys playing with them! Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Peppa Pig

customer_reviews.title: Cute but a little better sizing
customer_reviews.text: The sizing of the figures could have been a tad better....crowns are way to large
customer_reviews.author: Wayfarer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to use on cakes as decorations as well!
customer_reviews.author: donna F.

customer_reviews.title: Christmas
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter liked everything about Peppa pig and her family
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Creative and familiar
customer_reviews.text: My niece is obsessed with these little guys. They are small enough she can put them in stackable cups, her mini purse, etc. She loves that they have crowns and to make them sit and stand. She sings songs to them. She’s 20 months. Highly recommend for her age group. Arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: JULIE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect part for an expanded collection! Granddaughter loves anything Peppa Pig
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Quality was very good, granddaughter loved and plays with all the time. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Imelda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured and what it was suppose to be
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Franklin

customer_reviews.title: I am using these to fill a few Easter eggs with for my daughter this year and they are going to work perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted! I am using these to fill a few Easter eggs with for my daughter this year and they are going to work perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: would be better if bigger.
customer_reviews.text: I just bought them because Peppa's car only came with peppa and mummy pig and I want the hole family.
customer_reviews.author: Diego A. Toala

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My great niece loves Peppa Pig. I can't wait for Christmas when the royals join her collection.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Crandall

customer_reviews.title: Peppa everywhere.
customer_reviews.text: So much peppa. The daughter loves peppa. She has so much fun playing with these little figures with her peppa house, and adding them into scenarios with her brothers army men, but like any little toy beware of stepping on these things because you will curse peppa for days from the pain she caused you.
customer_reviews.author: cado406

product_meta.title: Peppa Pig Royal Family 4-Figure Pack
feature_bullets: Have a royal time with Princess Peppa and her Royal Family!
Each figure is dressed in sparkling crowns and royal attire
Includes Princess Peppa, little Prince George, Queen Mummy Pig, and King Daddy Pig articulated figures
Figures are perfectly scaled to play with other Peppa Pig playsets (sold separately)
Collect all the Peppa Pig Family Pack items for the ultimate playtime experience (each sold separately)
